website_summaries.verdict: The uncaged model of the Air Presto from Nike comes with modern innovation. Despite the absence of the cage found in the original Presto model, it continues to deliver a breathable upper, lightweight support, and comfortable feel.While some users had doubts about its durability and lack of stability, many remained satisfied with its performance. Just like the original, the shoe still features a “t-shirt like” feel.
pros: The Nike Air Presto Fly is a great-looking sneaker that is admired by some reviewers
Due to its upper mesh material, many users find it extremely breathable
Some users admire the lightweight construction of the shoe
It is among the Nike sneakers that deliver a comfortable feel, according to several buyers
Many wearers are highly-appreciative of the shoe’s “t-shirt-like” feel
Few users admire the supportive feel the Air Presto Fly sneakers provide
Some customers are satisfied with their purchase that they recommend the Nike Air Presto Fly shoes to their friends
The Air Presto Fly is reasonably-priced with an affordable price point to buy a second pair
cons: A few purchasers are disappointed because the shoe lacks durability
The one-piece collar and tongue while having a sock-like fit could be difficult to put on and off, a handful of users have commented

website_summaries.verdict: The Nike Air Presto, with its pioneering act of providing a sock-like fit and breathable upper, became the archetype of today's lightweight sneaker obsession and had attracted a loyal fanbase. The Presto Fly is an upgraded version of this icon.It retained its minimal silhouette, used a more advanced material for its upper for added durability, and opted for the FlyWire lacing system that provides a lockdown fit. This shoe's rich background coupled with its improvement in terms of design and comfort makes it a time-tested pair.
pros: An overwhelming majority of Nike Presto Fly reviews claim that it is a very comfortable shoe
Several wearers appreciate the ample arch support that this kick provides
This pair's Flywire lacing system impressed a good number of shoe users as it efficiently keeps their feet in place
Most of the consumers regarded this kick to be true to size
The Nike Presto Fly is available in an abundance of stylish colorways
A greater number of customers find this pair to be stylish
Some purchasers loved this pair so much that they decided to buy more pairs in different colorways
Its minimal and simple design makes for a versatile shoe, based on a few commenters
A handful of consumers said that it is lightweight and breathable, which adds to the kick's overall comfort
The shoe is flexible, according to some wearers
Several buyers deemed the Presto Fly, from the Swoosh brand, as a great shoe at a reasonable price
cons: A handful of consumers have shared that the Nike Presto Fly's small opening makes it hard to wear
Two reviewers claim that the kick's colors looked different in person than in the photos online
A few long-time Presto fans were bummed that this model didn't have the Air Tech unit as the previous releases

customer_reviews.title: Best Nike I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Great heel support and absorbtion, arch isn't bad. Didn't realize there isn't any tongue so it's like putting on a sock. Not the easiest to get on, but I've been using a shoe horn and that makes it doable. Within a week, I am now able to pull the shoe on using loop on the heel (with a lot of tugging). Once fitted, I feel like a high performance race car and quickly forget about the great effort putting them on. Only bought them because of the incredible deal one of the colors had; isn't the most attractive (prolly the reason). But that too is easily forgotten when I'm in motion wearing them. Money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: Keith D. Allen, MA, LPC

customer_reviews.title: Defective craftmanship.
customer_reviews.text: Shoes has a defective craftmanship. The shape of the toe end/tip of one shoe is slightly different than the other. One is slight rounded (right shoe) the other is more pointy. This is probably the reason shoes is discounted. Seems like shoes on sale at amazon are all defective in craftmanship. Not the first shoes I bought with defect. This is actually the third pair of shoes I’ve bought from amazon with defective craftmanship.
customer_reviews.author: Domingo

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: They fit well and I like the round toe which provides more comfort over other nike styles. Great for casual wear or working out.
customer_reviews.author: Hollywood2

customer_reviews.title: otherwise light and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The front lip comes up too high and strangle the ankles if they are just a wee bit fat, otherwise light and comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Gary Barrett

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre Style
customer_reviews.text: Its ok to big looking on my feet compared to any sneaker I own in my size.
customer_reviews.author: by Z rater

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and style
customer_reviews.text: got a pair for myself and then my husband. Most comfortable shoes we've both worn, not to mention looking fresh
customer_reviews.author: kait

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, great looking and fit a little small but overall a great shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Zane

customer_reviews.title: Might be great for young healthy feet
customer_reviews.text: lack of stability for me. Might be great for young healthy feet.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Carnahan

customer_reviews.title: Great quality,fit perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I didnt expect to much when i order this,honestly I was expecting some shity quality shoes but anyways I need them only for running but when I got them i was surprised how good they are and definitely I'm going to order another one...
customer_reviews.author: Tacna1993

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: my husband love these Presto fly running sneaker match with his nike sweat suit
customer_reviews.author: Evie

customer_reviews.title: Presto Fly
customer_reviews.text: I love Nike presto fly. It’s my fourth pair different colors.
customer_reviews.author: Marcelino Perez

customer_reviews.title: If package is open or tampered with be aware.
customer_reviews.text: I can not provide a review of the item because my package arrived open and my purchase was replace with an old pair of sneakerd
customer_reviews.author: William Barno

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe, Good feel.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect shoe. Excellent arch support if you're flat footed like I am, and some of the colorways look really slick. The River Rock/Dark Stucco is my favorite, it's more like a forest green in real life.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Infusino

customer_reviews.title: 😁
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe, a little longer and less wide than expected, but still a great shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Hollarbush

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my son he loved it fit perfect
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son he loved it fit perfect. He wears size 12 and the size 12 fit as expected
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Very lightweight and comfortable!! Ordered and arrived in 2 days
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these shoes! Very lightweight and comfortable!! Ordered and arrived in 2 days. Extremely impressed and very satisfied with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Traci Stiltner

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Maybe the most narrow Nike shoe I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Snug bug

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Sleek look, very comfy. Would surely buy again if they restock in a smaller size.
customer_reviews.author: Tristar

customer_reviews.title: not a great gym shoe
customer_reviews.text: limited side support ... more casual then gym based nice for walking .. not a good running or OXT style
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Guthrie

customer_reviews.title: Size & confort
customer_reviews.text: I love tue color & the shoes actually feel great on feet, just have to break them in if you're buying for walking, working or running..
customer_reviews.author: Demetri

customer_reviews.title: they fit great. Love the shoes
customer_reviews.text: Received them on time... they fit great. Love the shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Kisha M. McKinley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy to wear around town or to work on casual Friday's... love them!

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the all white ones and the ones I got in the mail were black with white trim.
customer_reviews.author: James Montijo

customer_reviews.title: Great product. It looks fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Great product. It looks fantastic. It ran a lil small but I'm sure within few weeks of using it'll fit better.
customer_reviews.author: Devron Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Preferred Shoe
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these. 2nd pair. Closet full of shoes and these get worn 70% of the time. We bought a 13 and he wears a 12. The 13s worked great. Says they are comfy and easy on and off.
customer_reviews.author: AverageJoeReview

customer_reviews.title: Light and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: By far my favorite model of Nike shoe. Excellent walking and standing shoe. Light and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Terrance W

product_meta.title: Nike Men's Presto Fly Shoes
product_meta.description: Genuine 2000 Remake, the Nike Soon Fly Men's Shoe wraps the foot in the comfort of your favourite t-shirt thanks to the breathable and incredibly flexible upper. Stretch mesh upper with TPU toe and heel for breathability and support Flywire cables are built into the laces for a dynamic fit. Foam midsole which also works as a sole for lightweight cushioning. Rubber spikes on heel and toe for amazing traction. Heel tongue for easy wear
